Race.SpecificTitle: Whitehall Fire District -- Prop.#1-10.05 Mill (Oper.Exp.)-BOC-10 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 10.05 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION OF WHITEHALL FIRE DISTRICT FOR MAINTAINING AND PAYING THE OPERATING EXPENSE OF THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Whitehall Fire District of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten and five hundredths (10.05) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $19,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of maintaining and paying the operating expense of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Whitehall Fire District -- Prop.#2-10.05 Mill(Maintenance)-BOC-10 Yr
Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 10.05 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR MAINTENANCE AND UPGRADING WHITEHALL FIRE DISTRICT WITH NECESSARY SUBSTATIONS, EQUIPMENT, AND INSURANCE.
Race.FullText: Shall Whitehall Fire District of the Parish of LaSalle, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten and five hundredths (10.05) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $19,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for maintenance and upgrading the District with necessary substations, equipment, and insurance?
